Title: Sentry Wards
Description:
We've spotted heavy air support over their base, in the form of way too many dwarves on way too many griffons. Means we can't get any vision of the area from above.

A troll... friend of mine gave us a set of Sentry Wards, which we can use to spy on their base and get a vantage point on what's going on in there.

Bad news, friend - you're going to be the one going in there.
ObjectivesText: Place Sentry Wards on the Docks, in the Town Hall, and on the Second Floor of the Barracks at Lion's Landing.

Objectives.Text: Sentry Ward placed in Town Hall
Sentry Ward placed in Barracks, 2nd Floor
